metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16839 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Curl versions 7.33.0 through 7.61.1 are vulnerable to a buffer overrun in the SASL authentication code that may lead to denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11').
